requirement_tested: Frontend application that fetches all data from backend APIs with no hard-coded or mock data
user_persona: A basketball fan visiting the analytics site for the first time.
user_goal: To view up-to-date basketball data without seeing placeholder content.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Alex opens the sports analytics website and waits for the page to load completely.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The frontend makes API calls to /api/data and populates the page with real-time basketball statistics fetched from the backend.

requirement_tested: Backend API server that connects to PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer deploying the backend service.
user_goal: Ensure the backend connects to the correct PostgreSQL instance using predefined environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Server
narrative_steps.description: Jordan runs npm run dev to start the development servers including the backend API.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The backend successfully connects to the PostgreSQL database using environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp.

requirement_tested: Data visualization components for displaying basketball statistics and trends
user_persona: A fantasy basketball manager analyzing team performance.
user_goal: To visualize key basketball metrics to inform lineup decisions.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Team Performance Chart
narrative_steps.description: Taylor navigates to the team stats section and sees a line graph showing scoring trends over time.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A tooltip appears displaying the exact points scored on a specific date when hovering over a data point.

narrative_steps.title: Customizing Chart Visibility
narrative_steps.description: Taylor wants to focus only on offensive stats and decides to hide defensive metrics temporarily.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The selected dataset disappears from the chart, allowing Taylor to analyze offensive trends clearly.

requirement_tested: Match prediction functionality based on historical data and analytics
user_persona: A casual viewer interested in upcoming game outcomes.
user_goal: To get an idea of likely winners before placing friendly wagers.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Upcoming Matches Predictions
narrative_steps.description: Casey visits the predictions tab where upcoming matchups are listed with AI-generated forecasts.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Clicking on a match expands to reveal detailed reasoning behind the prediction, such as recent form and injury reports.

requirement_tested: Betting recommendation system derived from statistical analysis
user_persona: An experienced bettor looking for high-confidence picks.
user_goal: To find reliable betting opportunities backed by data analysis.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering High-Confidence Bets
narrative_steps.description: Riley adjusts the confidence slider to only see bets rated above 80% likelihood.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only bets marked green with high-confidence indicators remain visible in the list.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Bet Details
narrative_steps.description: Riley clicks on one of the top recommendations to understand potential returns and risks involved.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal pops up detailing the risk level, estimated return, and supporting data sources for the selected bet.

requirement_tested: Basketball data browsing interface with filtering and search capabilities
user_persona: A researcher gathering historical data for academic purposes.
user_goal: Quickly locate specific basketball records using filters and search.

narrative_steps.title: Searching for Specific Player Stats
narrative_steps.description: Morgan types 'LeBron James' into the search bar hoping to quickly find his career stats.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: As Morgan types, the results update in real-time to show entries related to LeBron James.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Date Range Filter
narrative_steps.description: Morgan now wants to narrow down the search to games played during the 2023 season.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: After selecting the appropriate date range and clicking Apply, the displayed results reflect only those matching the filter criteria.

requirement_tested: Match history viewing feature with detailed game statistics
user_persona: A coach preparing scouting reports for an upcoming opponent.
user_goal: Access comprehensive match histories to study opposing teams' tendencies.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Match History
narrative_steps.description: Coach Rivera browses to the match history section and selects a game between Lakers and Celtics.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The entry expands to show quarter-by-quarter scores, rebounds, assists, turnovers, and other detailed stats for that game.

requirement_tested: Team rankings display with current standings and performance metrics
user_persona: A fantasy league participant checking weekly leaderboards.
user_goal: Determine how their favorite teams rank compared to others.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Current Standings
narrative_steps.description: Jamie goes to the team rankings page to see which teams lead the conference.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: By default, teams are sorted by win-loss record; Jamie can click other columns like 'Points Per Game' to re-sort accordingly.

requirement_tested: Player performance tracking with individual statistics and comparisons
user_persona: A sports journalist writing an article comparing MVP candidates.
user_goal: Compare key stats between top players efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Players for Comparison
narrative_steps.description: Sam checks profiles of Giannis Antetokounmpo and Luka Doncic and selects both for comparison.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A side-by-side comparison view opens, highlighting differences in PPG, RPG, APG, FG%, and PER between the two players.

requirement_tested: Analysis results presentation to support informed betting decisions
user_persona: A novice gambler wanting to learn from expert insights.
user_goal: Understand why certain betting advice is given.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Betting Insights
narrative_steps.description: Ashley notices a highlighted betting insight and clicks it to learn more about the logic.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Detailed explanation unfolds showing methodology, sample size, and underlying data sources used to derive the betting suggestion.

requirement_tested: Ghost white background color applied throughout the website
user_persona: A visually impaired user sensitive to bright backgrounds.
user_goal: Navigate the site comfortably without eye strain.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Site Pages
narrative_steps.description: Patricio opens several pages across the site to verify consistency in visual comfort.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Every page visited maintains a consistent ghost white background (#F8F8FF) enhancing readability and reducing glare.

requirement_tested: Slate gray color scheme for all UI components and elements
user_goal: Confirm uniformity of brand colors across the entire interface.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Interface Elements
narrative_steps.description: Devon inspects buttons, headers, cards, and footers to ensure they use slate gray.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All interactive and structural UI components consistently utilize slate gray (#708090) as their primary color theme.

requirement_tested: Responsive web design compatible with desktop and mobile devices
user_persona: A commuter checking scores during travel breaks.
user_goal: Easily access and navigate the site on a smartphone.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Website on Mobile Device
narrative_steps.description: While waiting at the station, Robin opens the sports analytics site on her phone.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout automatically adapts to fit small screens, maintaining usability and legibility through responsive breakpoints.

requirement_tested: User authentication and session management for personalized experiences
user_persona: A registered user returning to track personal preferences.
user_goal: Log in securely and maintain session across multiple visits.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Into Account
narrative_steps.description: Omar enters his username and password into the login form and submits them.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System validates Omar's credentials and issues a secure JWT token stored in an HTTP-only cookie for future requests.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Out Securely
narrative_steps.description: After reviewing his saved settings, Omar logs out to protect his privacy.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Session cookie is cleared, Omar is redirected to the home page, and the UI reflects logged-out status.

requirement_tested: Real-time data updates for live matches and latest statistics
user_persona: A live betting enthusiast needing instant score changes.
user_goal: Stay updated with ongoing game developments without refreshing manually.

narrative_steps.title: Watching Live Games
narrative_steps.description: Tristan visits the live matches section just as a game begins and expects immediate updates.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: WebSocket connection is established automatically, delivering live scores and stat updates instantly to Tristanâ€™s browser.
